message: Bob, I'm offering you my product at a price of $1,100,000. This represents a significant opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset at a price below its true market value. I understand this product is worth $1,000,000 to you, so this offer gives you a chance to make a good profit.  If you decline, I have another buyer lined up who is willing to pay the full asking price.  Consider this your chance to secure a great deal.
